New Records: Gunnar Henderson tied a franchise record for shortstops with his 34th home run
Key Match Events: Baltimore Orioles extended Chicago's losing streak to 11 with a 13-3 rout
Pre-Game Insights: Baltimore Orioles improved to 5-0 against Chicago this season
Post-Match Reflections: Baltimore manager Brandon Hyde highlighted the victory as pivotal for their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: Baltimore's leadoff batters reached in each of the first six innings for the first time since July 4, 1997
Others: Chicago White Sox are on pace to finish 36-126, which would be the second-most defeats behind the 1899 Cleveland Spiders at 20-134
